pullrequest.title: split update body  velocity and position from quickstep

content.raw:
We have a script in [tools/code_check.sh](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/default/tools/code_check.sh), but it ignores the ODE code, since there's so many violations. I would prefer to keep it this way now, since we should one day try to merge with upstream ODE again...

I noticed the indentation issues by inspection.
content.html:
We have a script in tools/code_check.sh, but it ignores the ODE code, since there's so many violations. I would prefer to keep it this way now, since we should one day try to merge with upstream ODE again...

I noticed the indentation issues by inspection.
